sentences.cn: “ 苏珊-哈帕, 是你干的 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: " And I dreamt that Joe Harper's mother was here. "
sentences.cn: “ 我还梦见乔-哈帕的妈妈也在这里. ”

sentences.en: " Huck Finn the Red - Handed, and Joe Harper the Terror of the Seas. "
sentences.cn: “ 赤手大盗哈克 - 费恩, 海上死神乔-哈帕. ”

sentences.en: " Joe Harper, have you seen my Tom this morning? "
sentences.cn: “ 乔-哈帕, 你早上看到我家汤姆了 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: " Look here, Joe Harper, whose is that tick? "
sentences.cn: “ 听着, 乔-哈帕, 这扁虱是谁的? ”

sentences.en: At last, Harper deigned to speak.
Dick and Jane Harper are an ordinary married couple.
sentences.cn: 迪克和珍?哈波是对平凡夫妻.

sentences.en: Harper made an abstract of Prof. Hunter's lecture.
sentences.cn: 哈珀将亨特教授的讲座做了摘要.

sentences.en: Harper was a teacher by profession.
Mr. Harper bought out a nearby hardware store.
sentences.cn: 哈珀先生盘进附近一家五金店的全部货底.

sentences.en: Now appeared Joe Harper, as airily clad and elaborately armed as Tom.
sentences.cn: 这时,乔-哈帕出现了.和汤姆一样,他精心装备,轻装上阵.

sentences.en: Sereny Harper shall know of this before I'm an hour older.
sentences.cn: 我这就去跟赛伦尼-哈帕(乔的母亲)讲,让她来解释解释这个.

sentences.en: The self - styled ` Reverend'Harper is not a real clergyman at all.
sentences.cn: 这位自称‘教士 ’ 的哈珀根本就不是真正的教士.

sentences.en: When Colonel Harper found out, he would go ape.
sentences.cn: 哈珀上校发现了一定会勃然大怒。

words.tran_cn: 弹奏竖琴；喋喋不休；不停地说
